author: fanf
msg: Fix for the security problem spotted by Lars Eilebrecht <lars@hyperreal.org>

author: manoj
msg: Speed up building, by making --disable-shared the default until we put
proper DSO support into the autoconf configuration scripts.

author: manoj
msg: Don't actually run ./configure in buildconf, it wastes lots of time if
we want to use ./configure's flags, among other things.

author: manoj
msg: We actually don't have to remove config.cache, because
AC_CONFIG_SUBDIRS redirects APR's config.cache to point to Apache's.

author: manoj
msg: Make building a little easier by not requiring a separate make of APR.
